title: A Speedy Recovery Depends on More Aid. Will Trump Deliver?
sub_head: The economy can’t wait until January for more help for states, businesses and the unemployed.
body:
Majority Leader Mitch McConnell sent the Senate home for recess without passing a new coronavirus relief bill. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin has said he will pull the plug on several of the Federal Reserve’s emergency lending facilities. What are these men thinking?
Yes, the recent news on the vaccine front is wonderful. We are all indebted to the scientists who have worked so long, hard and successfully on the various vaccine projects. Thanks to them, the proverbial light at the end of the tunnel is dimly visible. But...
